text: Željko Šturanović (; 31 January 1960 - 30 June 2014) was a Montenegrin politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Socialists of Montenegro (DPSCG). He was the Prime Minister of Montenegro from 10 November 2006 to 29 February 2008. He stepped down from the job because of health reasons. Šturanović was born in Nikšić, People's Republic of Montenegro, Federal People's Republic of Yugoslavia (now Montenegro). He studied at the University of Montenegro Faculty of Law. Šturanović died from lung cancer on 30 June 2014, aged 54. His wife and two children outlived him. ==References== ==Other websites== * Željko Šturanović at Democratic Party of Socialists of Montenegro (DPSCG) Category:1960 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Yugoslavian lawyers Category:Prime Ministers of Montenegro
title: Željko Šturanović
